name: The Telepathy Club and the Haunted House Project
name_original: The Telepathy Club and the Haunted House Project
description:
"(Even if I hate my powers, I'm useless without them.)"

The town of Kohne is just the place you didn’t know you’ve been looking for. The last months of Summer have been beautiful and vivid and fleeting but perhaps it’s time for the dream to end. After registering the club officially, you’re tasked with participating in the school’s club showcase. Can your club survive the first semester?

Demo Features:

  • two male romanceable love interests
  • two hair color choices to customize your renameable MC

Please be aware that this is a demo! Sprites should be fully coded in but there is no music, and testing was minimal. It's taking a while, but I hope you'll look forward to the finished release!
